item.title: St. John's Episcopal Church - Savannah, Georgia
item.description: The only non-Catholic church we visited. Reminded us of the Ordinariate parish my parents attend.

item.title: Cathedral Basilica of St. John the Baptist - Savannah, Georgia
item.description: The most beautiful church we visited on the trip. The painting and design truly move the soul.
